mapper.select:
select res.id ReserveId,r.id RoomId,r.type RoomType,reg.guestName as GuestName,m.id as MemberId, reg.arriveTime as ArriveTime,reg.leaveTime as LeaveTime,reg.tel as Tel from reserve res join roomregister reg on res.roomRegister=reg.id join room r on reg.room=r.id right outer join member m on reg.guestId=m.id
res.reserveDate =curdate()

select cki.id CheckInId,r.id RoomId,r.type RoomType,reg.guestName as GuestName,m.id as MemberId, reg.arriveTime as ArriveTime,reg.leaveTime as LeaveTime,reg.tel as Tel from checkin cki join roomregister reg on cki.roomRegister=reg.id join room r on reg.room=r.id right outer join member m on reg.guestId=m.id
cki.checkInDate =curdate()

select cko.id CheckOutId,r.id RoomId,r.type RoomType,reg.guestName as GuestName,m.id as MemberId, reg.arriveTime as ArriveTime,reg.leaveTime as LeaveTime,reg.tel as Tel from checkout cko join checkin cki on cko.checkIn=cki.id join roomregister reg on cki.roomRegister= reg.id join room r on reg.room=r.id right outer join member m on reg.guestId=m.id where date_format(reg.leaveTime,'%y-%m-%d')=curdate()
